name: Weezing
description: The Poison Gas Pokémon. This Pokémon lives and grows by absorbing poison gas, dust, and germs that exist inside garbage.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to ground moves.

abilities.name: Neutralizing Gas
abilities.description: The abilities of Pokémon within 30ft of this Pokémon are nullified and cannot trigger. This nullification does not apply to the Neutralizing Gas ability or any form changes.

abilities.name: Stench
abilities.description: When this Pokémon is hit by a melee attack, roll a d10. On a 10, the attacker flinches.
